snippet: Federal authorities are developing criminal cases related to the multibillion-dollar trading loss at JPMorgan Chase. | The buyout industry may not be as fiercely competitive as it seems. | Congress should consider setting a specific limit on the size...
abstract: Federal authorities are developing criminal cases related to the multibillion-dollar trading loss at JPMorgan Chase. | The buyout industry may not be as fiercely competitive as it seems. | Congress should consider setting a specific limit on the size of financial institutions, a Fed official said. | Goldman Sachs is already preparing a response to Greg Smith's book.
